name: Tower Defense: Defender of the Kingdom
name_original: Tower Defense: Defender of the Kingdom
description:
Defender of the Kingdom: Tower Defense is a colorful medieval tower defense strategy game where orcs and their horde attacked the kingdom and now the fate of the kingdom is in your hands, defenders!

Murderous war began... Defense of the Kingdom – your primary goal. The people believe in you. Build a defensive line with a powerful tower and defend your kingdom. Build tower, upgrade your towers, use the magic support and stopped the invaders!

If you like tower defense then you will love Defender of the Kingdom!

Remember, defender – orcs must die! Are you ready? Let's start the battle!

Game Features:
  • Genre – strategy & tower defense
  • Amazing 3D graphics and heroic music
  • 40 interesting levels
  • 10 different towers with upgrades to increase strategic choice
  • Colorful magic support to eliminate enemies in defense zone
